Fixability.ManualSteps:
1. Analise cada issue do linter
2. Corrija manualmente, entendendo o contexto
3. NÃO use golangci-lint run --fix (pode quebrar código)
4. Execute testes após cada correção

Examples: internal\http\router.go:16:35: unused-parameter: parameter 'r' seems to be unused, consider removing or renaming it as _ (revive)
internal\slo\alerting.go:657:7: string `warning` has 3 occurrences, but such constant `SeverityWarning` already exists (goconst)
internal\slo\alerting.go:655:7: string `critical` has 3 occurrences, but such constant `SLOStatusCritical` already exists (goconst)
internal\slo\alerting.go:230:1: cyclomatic complexity 21 of func `(*AlertManager).shouldSilence` is high (> 18) (gocyclo)
